title: How to stop my volume from going down by itself - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you mean the volume on a device like a phone or audio system? Or do you mean TV sound when the program uses that invention from hell automatic volume control, or are you referring to the volume of your own voice? Probably the answer is for you to take the device to a service engineer. There may be a problem with a component in your device. But please, when asking a question, pretend you are a listener and decide if you fully understand the question.
